name: Remove this WPcom Smiley
author: Alexander Troshin

sections.description: Remove this WPcom Smiley plugin removes the wordpress.com stats smiley for all WordPress installations with the plugin JetPack.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin .zip file
  2. Go to Plugins/Add new/Upload in the WordPress administration panel.
  3. Find and select the plugin .zip file and click upload.
  4. Click on “Activate Plugin”
  5. Profit…?
sections.faq:
Why this plugin?

This plugin removes the WordPress.com smiley in a safer way than most plugins and dosent require any CSS changes!
